Hi, I'm Renee.

I'm a San Francisco based product designer. I believe the world is complicated enough - the products we use shouldn't have to be. I move pixels and prototype quickly, but empathy and data are the champions of my toolset. I spend my free time writing on Medium, teaching through Hacker Fund, climbing fake rocks, exploring the world, and taking pictures.

I have strong opinions, loosely held, and I'm always excited to learn.


To chat, hit me up at renee@padgham.com. I'm actively interviewing and my resume lives here.
